backend/main.mo: Defines actor with authorization, storage, and Stripe mixins plus types and comparators for teams, players, sponsors, and related domain models.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence reports linking feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files for reference or documentation.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables for light and dark modes and applying global styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entrypoint loading fonts, metadata, favicon, and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes, initializes query client, and sets up the main application component with theming and toasts.
frontend/src/components/admin/AccessDeni: Access denied UI for unauthorized users with option to return home.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRoute: Route guard that checks authentication and admin status, showing loaders or access-denied screen as needed.
frontend/src/components/CountdownTimer.t: React countdown timer component computing remaining time and rendering responsive time blocks updated every second.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component with organization info, quick links, contact details, disclaimer, and scroll-to-top link behavior.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive header with navigation, admin links, and login status handling.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Page layout wrapper adding header, footer, WhatsApp button, and scroll-to-top on route change.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with toast notifications and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal form allowing users to submit basic profile info and save it via mutation.
frontend/src/components/WhatsAppButton.t: Floating button that opens a WhatsApp chat with a preset message.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity context and provider managing authentication state, login, logout, and identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for user profiles, roles, admin checks, and identity-based queries tied to a backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, typography, and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and mounts the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the public About page with vision, mission, and tournament feature sections using styled cards and icons.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Displays admin stats such as registrations, payments, and inquiries with protected access via an admin route guard.
frontend/src/pages/AdminLoginPage.tsx: Handles admin authentication using Internet Identity, admin role checks, and initial admin role assignment UI.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPlayersPage.tsx: Admin interface for viewing, searching, exporting, and updating payment status of player registrations. Combines authenticated and anonymous registrations into a unified table with CSV export.
frontend/src/pages/AdminSponsorsPage.tsx: Admin page for managing sponsor inquiries, allowing status updates, deletion, and viewing counts by status. Displays inquiries in a table with status badges and actions.
frontend/src/pages/AdminTeamsPage.tsx: Admin view showing all teams with logos and details like purse and owner. Provides a read-only team grid with loading skeletons and future editing placeholder.
frontend/src/pages/AuctionTeamsPage.tsx: Public page outlining auction rules and displaying participating teams with their logos. Includes a featured auction image and descriptive sections.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Contact page presenting location, email, WhatsApp links, and guidance for queries. Includes a quick-contact section for players, sponsors, and team owners.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Homepage showcasing the tournament’s highlights, team logos, registration info, and hero section. Uses dynamic data like registration counts and team list while promoting key navigation paths.
frontend/src/pages/HowItWorksPage.tsx: Displays a step‑by‑step explanation of the tournament process with images and descriptions. Alternates layout per step using a mapped steps array.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentCancelPage.tsx: Shows a payment cancellation message with help info and navigation buttons. Provides contact details and options to retry registration or return home.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Validates and displays payment success details after registration. Handles loading, error states, and shows payment metadata and next steps.
frontend/src/pages/PlayerRegistrationPag: Implements a detailed player registration form with validation, prefilled user data, and submission flow. Handles various player fields, errors, and conditional form display.
frontend/src/pages/PrizesPage.tsx: Renders prize information cards and images for the tournament. Includes prize pool details and visual prize showcases.
frontend/src/pages/SponsorshipPage.tsx: Provides sponsorship tiers, benefits, and an inquiry form with validation and submission handling. Requires authentication to submit sponsorship inquiries.
frontend/src/pages/TeamsDetailPage.tsx: React page displaying official teams with logos, descriptions, loading state, and a grid layout using useGetTeams.
frontend/src/polyfills/processEnv.ts: Polyfills process.env at runtime and sets II_URL from import.meta.env or a default fallback.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL params, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based routing parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending typography, colors, fonts, animations, and container settings for the frontend.
project_state.json: Project state file describing current features, issues, and admin login problems for the Bihar Cricket Mahotsav site.
